channel.title: flavone biosynthesis on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in flavone biosynthesis on funPlantGenes

item.title: CmFNSII-1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Unigene0057769 Gene Symbol: CmFNSII-1 Gene Name: flavones synthase II gene Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: The predominant flavones in the ray florets of chrysanthemum flowers are apigenin and its derivatives, of which the contents are highly correlated with the expression of flavones synthase II gene CmFNSII-1.

item.title: CmHY5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: CmHY5 Gene Name: ELONGATED HYPOCOTYL5 Genome: Species: Chrysanthemum morifolium Functional Descriptions: CmHY5 functions in apigenin biosynthesis by regulating flavone synthase II expression in chrysanthemum flowers.
